About

I am a PhD student in theoretical linguistics at McGill University. My research interests primarily include formal semantics, pragmatics, phonology, and mathematical and computational linguistics. I also enjoy logic, linux, and beer.

This is my personal blog, where I write about any random thing that comes to mind. You can find my official academic website here.
